ee::api::sleep

ee::api::sleep Interface Reference

Ultra Low Power Sleep API. More...

Public Member Functions

void allowSleep ()
 Allow EE to enter in ULP retention mode.
void preventSleep ()

Detailed Description

Ultra Low Power Sleep API.

Runtime API in order to control retention mode entering.
